ColorExt - Class in jp.ikanoshiokara.FPL.view

ColorExt() - Constructor for class jp.ikanoshiokara.FPL.view.ColorExt
 

G

generateColor(PApplet) - Static method in class jp.ikanoshiokara.FPL.view.ColorExt
引数に入れたPAppletのcolorModeに合ったcolorを生成する
Sample:
color c = ColorExt.generateColor(this);
println("R: " + red(c) + " G: " + green(c) + " B: " + blue(c));
generateColor(PGraphics) - Static method in class jp.ikanoshiokara.FPL.view.ColorExt
引数に入れたPGraphicsのcolorModeに合ったcolorを生成する Sample: PGraphics pg = new PGraphics(); color c = ColorExt.generateColor(pg); println("R: " + red(c) + " G: " + green(c) + " B: " + blue(c));
